profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Human Resources and member of the Strategic Board of the Boels Rental Group.
Boels Rental is one of the largest rental companies in Europe and operates across 18 countries under multi-brands including Boels Rental and Cramo. 
The Group consist out of approx. 7.000 employees and generates 1.3 Billion Euro revenue.
The HR team consist out of approx. 100 HR-professionals in the field of HR-Business Partnering, HR Services, Learning & Development and Recruitment located across 10+ countries in Europe.

Key results:
- Successful integration of several companies including Cramo, a Scandinavian stock listed company (2.500 employees)
- Implementation of standardized and digitalised HR-processes across the Group supported by a uniform HR-system landscape
- Introduced Employee Engagement surveys and action plans leading to 81% participation and 79% positive Engagement Index
- Installed employee representation governance body at Boels Rental the Netherlands
- Implemented a broad portfolio of Learning & Development solutions, including functional e-learnings, e-library, online personal development platform and Group wide sales trainings 
- Introduced Group wide transparent job architecture and salary scales enabling career development and internal and external equity
- Established an equipped recruitment team managing over 1.000 hires at a filling rate of 85% and an average time to fill of 55 days. Activities include referral programs, general employer branding campaigns and specific targeted campaigns on critical roles
- Enabled management to successfully manage their teams through zero tolerance on ethical leadership, learning programs, information sharing and an open learning culture within the management community leading to  81% positive Management Index  
- Reduced Employment cost as % of Revenue from 31.5% to 28.5% through organizational effectiveness measures
